thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
I bought new wheels and had existing tires mounted to them. The wheels were a special order. The guys were very knowledgeable and helpful. They processed the order for me and made sure everything would fit.
A few days later the wheels arrived and I had the tires mounted and the new wheels put on. They did great work. I'm very happy with the job they did.
